core

Class ContentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ContentManager

  • public class ContentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Facilitates the loading of game content in a streamlined manor that also keeps resources loaded throughout runtime
    Author:
    Vee

      ContentManager()

        Sets the root directory for the content manager

      • createFont

        public static boolean createFont(java.lang.String textureName,
                                 Point letterSize)
        Creates a font from a texture and stores it in the content manager
        Parameters:
        textureName - the name of the texture to load
        letterSize - the size of each font letter
        Returns:

      • loadImage

        public static boolean loadImage(com.jogamp.opengl.GL3 gl,
                                java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                int width,
                                int height)
        Loads an image and creates a copy of it on the GPU for access with the renderer
        Parameters:
        gl - the GL context to create the texture in
        path - the path to load the texture from
        name - the name the texture will be addressed with
        width - the width of the texture
        height - the height of the texture
        Returns:
        whether the load was successful

                               java.lang.String name)
        Loads a plain text file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the plain text file
        name - the name that the file will be addressed by
        Returns:

        public static java.lang.String[] getTextByName(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a plain text file of the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file
        Returns:
        the plain text file as a string array, or an empty string if loading fails

        Returns:
